about_the_game:
This experience was originally created in one week for Scream Jam 2018, in which it won Spook Award (Best Game) and Scare Award (Scariest Game). Since then new content as been added through a series of updates.

Story

When Sean's new girlfriend Sarah invites him over for dinner, the last thing he expects is a fight for his life. It's the night before Halloween and a new terror is about to be unleashed from the deep web.. The Emulator!

Play as Sean and try to find a way to survive or even defeat the Emulator; a creative enemy who can hide in plain site. Make use of keys and other various items that can be found in and out of the house to progress to new rooms and areas, all the while watching for anything that seems out of place. You'll never know what corner the Emulator may be lurking around, and even when you think you do he may find ways to surprise you. Stay vigilant, and when all goes red be sure to run and hide.

Features

  • A House With Numerous Rooms and Secrets
  • A Unique Assailant
  • Five Endings With Unique Cutscenes
  • A One Hit Challenge Mode
  • Original Music Composed by Clement Panchout

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains violence and gore. The gore is presented through low resolution graphics.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 Yosemite or later
  • Processor: Any 64 or 32 bit processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL Compatable Video Card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: The Emulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS 7 / WINDOWS 8 / WINDOWS 10
  • Processor: Any 64 or 32 bit processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL Compatable Video Card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
